result.reason: Feature request to add per-folder/subfolder password protection, allowing granular access control instead of only whole-file locking.
result.approach: Add a Password property to ContainerInfo, prompt for password when expanding a protected folder in the tree, persist the setting in XML/SQL serializers, and add a context menu option to set/remove folder password.

attempts.raw_output:
Based on the issue details, this is a feature request for per-folder password protection in the connection tree (currently only the entire connection file can be password-locked).

```json
{"decision":"implement","reason":"Feature request to add per-folder/subfolder password protection, allowing granular access control instead of only whole-file locking.","priority":"P3-enhancement","estimated_files":["mRemoteNG/Container/ContainerInfo.cs","mRemoteNG/UI/Window/ConnectionTreeWindow.cs","mRemoteNG/UI/Controls/ConnectionTree/ConnectionTree.cs","mRemoteNG/Config/Serializers/Xml/XmlConnectionsSerializer.cs","mRemoteNG/Config/Serializers/Xml/XmlConnectionsDeserializer.cs"],"approach":"Add a Password property to ContainerInfo, prompt for password when expanding a protected folder in the tree, persist the setting in XML/SQL serializers, and add a context menu option to set/remove folder password."}
```
